hero.title: Your Personal Skill Map
hero.subtitle: Build your career roadmap. Import skills from your resume or explore any career path. Visualize progress and generate tailored resumes.
hero.searchPlaceholder: Try "Software Engineer" or "I want to work remotely"

twoPaths.importDescription: Already have a resume or LinkedIn profile? Let AI extract your existing skills and build your map automatically.
twoPaths.exploreDescription: Discover what skills you need for any career. Search thousands of roles and see the complete skill map.

workflow.title: How It Works
workflow.step1Description: Upload any document - PDF, Word, images, or paste a LinkedIn URL. Our AI extracts skills, contact info, education, experience, projects, and professional summary.
workflow.step2Description: Watch your skills transform into an interactive map. Identify gaps, track progress, and discover connections.
workflow.step3Description: Create AI-tailored resumes and cover letters in English, Chinese, or Japanese. Paste a job posting URL and get professional documents in seconds.

import.title: Import from Anywhere
import.description: PDF resumes, Word docs, images, LinkedIn, GitHub, and more

skillMaps.title: AI-Generated Skill Maps
skillMaps.description: Visualize skills needed for any career path

resume.title: Multilingual Resume & Cover Letter
resume.description: AI-tailored resumes and cover letters in English, Chinese, and Japanese

education.title: Education & Credentials
education.description: Keep degrees and certifications alongside work history

chat.title: AI Chat Assistant
chat.description: Modify your skill map with natural language

universe.title: Skill Universe Dashboard
universe.description: See all your skills across every career path

share.title: Share Your Progress
share.description: Public skill maps with unique URLs

demo.title: See Your Skills Come to Life
demo.description: Here's what a skill map looks like. Yours is waiting to be discovered.

secondaryCta.title: Explore Career Paths
secondaryCta.description: Search for any career and discover the skills you need to succeed. AI generates comprehensive skill maps for thousands of roles.
secondaryCta.searchPlaceholder: Try "Software Engineer" or "I want to work remotely"

footer: Built with Next.js, React Flow, and OpenAI.
footerPowered: Powered by AI skill map generation.

suggestions.title: Career Suggestions
suggestions.subtitle: Based on your preferences, here are some careers you might enjoy:
